charges.charge_description: KNOWINGLY AND WITHOUT AUTHORIZATION, ESCAPED AND REMAINED ABSENT FROM THE LUZERNE COMMUNITY CORRECTIONS CENTER IN PHILADELPHIA, PA., THAT IS, THE FEDERAL INSTITUTION OR FACILITY TO WHICH THE DEFENDANT WAS CONFINED BY THE ATTORNEY GENERAL OF THE UNITED STATES, IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:751(a).

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 18 MONTHS, SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 YEARS, SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $100, FINE: $500
